programme.title: The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E04, In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: A is for Arson
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E23, Firefighter Gary Parks is killed in a fire ruled arson, the investigation into his death shifts to homicide. A serial arsonist is thought to be the culprit.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E02, With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: A Family Cursed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E09, One family faces two unsolved murders of their loved ones. It takes thirteen years for detectives to uncover the one missing clue that can lead them to the killer: the hidden crime scene.

programme.title: Woman in the Woods
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E12, In August 1972, the body of Jody Loomis is found in the woods. 34 years later, the killer's DNA is recovered from Jody's old clothing but it isn't matched until 2018.

programme.title: Cold Ashes
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E20, When a deadly house fire claims the life of a family in rural Oklahoma, investigators suspect foul play and it sends a mother on a decades-long crusade to find out what happened to her missing teenage daughter and best friend.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E23, The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E17, In Rhode Island, policewomen go undercover as streetwalkers to nab the man suspected of murdering three prostitutes. And a dagger-shaped letter opener is the key piece of evidence that links a priest to the grisly 1980 murder of a nun in Ohio.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E21, A North Carolina man looking to clear his conscience gives police the information they need to solve a murder. And Indiana police are baffled by the murder of an 86-year-old woman, found dead in her bedroom.

programme.title: Suspicious Minds
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E10, In 1984, a 15-year-old girl is found murdered in her grandparents' home. For decades, a stalled investigation only fuels the town rumor mill, pointing an accusing finger at her 13-year-old sister.

programme.title: One Tough Mother
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E18, In July 1997, the brutal murder of 19-year-old Tiffany Johnston rocks the small town of Bethany, Oklahoma. DNA points to her killer over a decade later and leads investigators across state lines.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E01, After 46 years, LA homicide detectives take a Lover's Lane bandit who also gunned down two police officers into custody. Then, DNA testing helps lead police in Florida to a suspected killer, however, the killer has an identical twin.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E04, Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: A Killer Slips Away
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E10, The loving aunt of a close-knit family is stabbed to death in her home. It takes two decades for detectives to discover that a key witness was an imposter--and caused the case to go cold.

programme.title: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E01, A kidnapper grabs 8-year-old Chad Choice from his home in Texas, then torments his parents with two ransom demands. The case goes cold until the parents receive a chilling package in the mail that contains a letter--and a skull.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E17, A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E06, A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession. Her body was later found floating in a drainage canal. At the time, a key witness hinted that a member of the Catholic clergy may have been responsible.
Film Crew: Killers From Space, 20070807070000 +0000, Former Mystery Science Theater 3000 crew rip apart Killers from Space.
MST3K: Gunslinger, 19931009000000 +0000, The widow of a murdered sheriff attempts to clean up the crime in her small town with help from the man hired to kill her.

MST3K: The Day The Earth Froze, 19930116000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots learn the ins and outs of the circus in the short Here Comes the Circus (1946) and then try to make sense of the Nordic fairy tale film The Day the Earth Froze (1959).
Film Crew: The Wild Women of Wongo, 20070911070000 +0000, Bob Honcho orders the Film Crew to provide a commentary track for the bizarre prehistoric adventure film, The Wild Women of Wongo (1958).

MST3K: Being From Another Planet, 19920704000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots watch a re-edited version of Time Walker (1982) called "Being From Another Planet" in which a mummy awakened by a university team goes on a killing spree.

MST3K: Bloodlust, 19940903000000 +0000, Mike and the Bots watch a cheap ripoff of The Most Dangerous Game, where a rich game hunter tricks a group of stranded college kids into becoming prey for his latest blood sport.

MST3K: Bride Of The Monster, 19930123000000 +0000, Horror cinema icons Bela Lugosi and Tor Johnson star in this Ed Wood classic as the crazed Dr. Vornoff and his beastly assistant Lobo, who conduct heinous experiments on human victims in an effort to create a race of atomic super-beings.
MST3K: Catalina Caper, 19901013000000 +0000, Two college boys enjoy Catalina Island sunshine, scuba diving, and beach 'bunnies', while another boy's con-artist parents scheme to sell a stolen scroll.
MST3K: Cave Dwellers, 19910531070000 +0000, Wise ruler Akronas (aka “The Great One”) is the keeper of an incredibly powerful but potentially deadly device.

Missing Pieces, 20000206000000 +0000, A Colorado rancher uncovers a bed of lies and unanswered questions as he investigates his son's apparent suicide. Stars James Coburn. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.
Summer of Dreams, 20160101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Fading pop star Debbie Taylor finds her way into teaching music to misfit kids.

The Wedding March, 20160625000000 +0000, After two decades apart, college sweethearts Olivia and Mick are reunited when Mick is booked as the singer at Olivia's wedding to another man. Stars Jack Wagner, Emily Tennant and Josie Bissett.

The Memory Book, 20140726000000 +0000, At a flea market, Chloe discovers a book of photos showcasing the romance of a young couple from the early seventies. She sets out on a literal and emotional journey to find the happy couple she knows only through photos.

The Blackwater Lightship, 20040204000000 +0000, Based on the novel by Colm Toibin, The Blackwater Lightship tells the compelling story of reconciliation between three generations of women that has been marked by decades of misunderstandings.

programme.title: Starting Over... Again
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E01, Hallmark Original Series. Like mother, like daughter!

programme.title: Running Scared
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E02, Hallmark Original Series. Middleton's Heritage Festival gets everyone in town talking.

programme.title: Do the Right Thing
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E03, Hallmark Original Series. Trouble is brewing after Cassie's mystery guest Ashley goes missing.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E04, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's mischievous cousin Abigail is back in Middleton.

programme.title: Pilot
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E01, Hallmark Original Series. Abby returns to Maryland when she receives a phone call from her sister.

programme.title: Home to Roost, Part One
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E02, Hallmark Original Series. The O'Brien family reunites in Chesapeake Shores for the first time in years.

programme.title: The Ghost In The Machine
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E05, After a series of anomalies and power disruptions, the Atlantis team is faced with an impossible decision: to create the means to release an mysterious entity or stand by as it systematically destroys the city’s technological infrastructure.

programme.title: The Shrine
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E06, On a flight back to Atlantis, McKay inexplicably falls ill. Fearing the worst, the doctor summons McKay’s sister to say her goodbyes. But Ronan tells Jeannie of a shrine that would grant Rodney one day to be himself again, before he dies.

programme.title: Whispers
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E07, Dr. Beckett (Paul McGillion) is asked to delay his departure from Atlantis when word comes that Major Anne Teldy (Christina Cox) and her away team have stumbled onto one of Michael’s abandoned labs inside an extensive underground catacomb.

programme.title: The Queen
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E08, Keller and the Atlantis team meet with the Wraith, Todd, to deliver a startling proposition. Keller believes she has found a cure for the Wraiths of their need to feed on humans but requires a test subject for this breakthrough treatment.

programme.title: Tracker
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E09, McKay and Ronan volunteer to assist Dr. Jennifer Keller with a medical follow-up away from Atlantis. Later, when the pair return to her, they are surprised to learn that she left earlier but a search of the village turns up no sign of her.

programme.title: Cloverdale
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E05, While exploring a new planet, Lt. Scott is attacked by an aggressive plant-like creature that infects him. Scott's circumstances turn dire and Tamara must search for a way to stop the alien infection from spreading while more creatures move in.

programme.title: Trial And Error
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E06, Col. Young (Louis Ferreira) is plagued by a recurring vision wherein Destiny is attacked and destroyed by aliens. After placing the crew on high alert, he starts to feel that he may be losing his mind and questions his ability as the commander!

programme.title: The Greater Good
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E07, When Destiny comes upon a heavily damaged ship, Dr. Rush and Col. Young decide to make a dangerous space-suited expedition to the ship. But an unexpected turn of events leaves Dr. Rush and Col. Young stranded aboard the strange vessel.

programme.title: Malice
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E08, Lucian Alliance prisoner Simeon escapes, creating a manhunt on a remote planet. But Homeworld Command orders he be captured alive, believing Simeon has valuable information. Simeon must be brought back to the Destiny before he kills or is killed.

programme.title: The Enemy Within
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E03, In this suspenseful tale of survival of the fittest, O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and the SG-1 team must attempt to remove a Goa'uld larva that has infected Kawalsky's (guest star Jay Acovone) brain … but time is running out!

programme.title: Emancipation
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E04, On the planet Simarka, where the fierce race of Shavadai mistreat females, Capt. Samantha Carter (Amanda Tapping) challenges their ways in a thrilling battle of wits that may bring women equity or forever keep them as second-class citizens.

programme.title: The Broca Divide
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E05, Returning from a planet with both a civilized and primitive side, all but two of the team become infected and spread a brutal virus. Will Teal'c and Jackson find the cause, or are their colleagues doomed to become Stone Age primitives?

programme.title: The First Commandment
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E06, The SG-1 team is sent after the SG-9 team that has failed to return. They find that the team's captain (William Russ), having been treated like a god by planetary inhabitants, is drunk with power and is tyrannizing them. Can they overcome him?

programme.title: Cold Lazarus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E07, A strange crystal strikes down O'Neill, replacing him with a double that returns with the team to Earth to find the cause of O'Neill's private grief...his son's death. But the double is dangerously unstable. Can O'Neill return home to save everyone?

programme.title: The Nox
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E08, When a planned ambush goes disastrously wrong, resulting in fatalities among the SG-1 team, the peace-loving Nox restore them to life. But while these gentle people can bring back the dead, can they resist the deadly technology of the Goa'uld?

programme.title: Brief Candle
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E09, On the mysterious planet Argos, the beautiful Kynthia seduces Colonel Jack O'Neill, which means he's condemned to an Argosian lifespan of only a hundred days. As he turns gray, will his team succeed in their frantic search for a cure?

programme.title: Thor's Hammer
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E10, Looking for allies against the Goa'uld, the SG-1 team lands on Cimmeria, home of the legendary Norse gods. Teal'c and O'Neill are transported to an underground labyrinth of caves of the vicious creature Unas. Can Carter & Daniel rescue them?

programme.title: Big Monday
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E14, Reports of a coming storm and enormous waves bring painful memories for Mitch. Meanwhile, Kaye tries to persuade the parents of a deaf girl to send her to sign-language school.

programme.title: Sea of Flames
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E15, A drugged-out drifter torches Eddie's lifeguard tower which leads the team to discover an illegal, lab distributing a new drug. Mitch and Thorpe try to convince the city board to buy wave runners in order to optimize their ability to save lives.

programme.title: Now Sit Right Back and You'll Hear a Tale
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E16, Eddie slips on the sand and hits his head on the tower ramp. When he regains consciousness, Eddie finds himself on an island with Gilligan, Mary Ann and the rest of the castaways.

programme.title: The Chamber
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E17, Mitch has an out-of-body experience when his attempt to save a trapped diver without scuba gear leaves him with the bends, dangerously close to death and in desperate need of a decompression chamber.

programme.title: Shark's Cove
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E18, Shauni is suspicious when a swimmer training for the Olympics disappears in "Shark's Cove.” Eddie's world is turned upside-down when he is reunited with his schizophrenic half-brother.

programme.title: The Lost Treasure of Tower 12
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E19, A bohemian poet flirts with Shauni, and with danger when he uses his metal detector to find the buried stash of two jewel thieves.

programme.title: The Big Spill
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E20, Mitch helps a former lifeguard, Lane Brody, investigate a corporation suspected of dumping deadly chemicals in the bay.

programme.title: Game of Chance
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E21, Harvey and Mitch go to play poker on an offshore yacht where they are robbed by a masked man that drives an amphibious Jeep. Shauni invites Eddie over for dinner at her parents’ house where her snobbish father strongly disapproves of him.

programme.title: Summer of '85
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E22, Shauni and Eddie visit a local fortune teller who predicts that Eddie will soon meet his first true love. Shauni thought he already had, and that it was her! But it's Lorna, an older woman Eddie had a "Summer of '42" affair with as a teenager.

programme.title: River of No Return, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E01, The mysterious death of Mitch's uncle and the cryptic will he left, finds Mitch, Hobie, Eddie, and Shauni on a whitewater rafting adventure. Meanwhile, rookie lifeguard hopefuls participate in the annual qualifying swim.

programme.title: River of No Return, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E02, A whitewater rafting trip turns deadly when Mitch, Hobie, Eddie, Shauni and CJ are pursued by the murderous miners that killed Mitch's uncle to get his map leading to the "Golden Boot" that Mitch and the others are now searching for.

programme.title: Tequila Bay
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E03, Jimmy Slade and Matt Brody tangle with a violent surf gang, while Mitch's life is thrown into turmoil when former lover Stephanie Holden assumes co-command of Baywatch headquarters.

programme.title: Rookie of the Year
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E04, Summer and Matt face grueling personal and physical challenges in Rookie School, the "boot camp” of lifeguarding, while unusual circumstances force female odd couple CJ and Stephanie to share an apartment.

programme.title: Pier Pressure
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E05, Hobie and Summer each find themselves torn between doing the right thing and giving in to dangerous social pressures.

programme.title: Showdown at Malibu Beach High
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E06, Malibu Beach High students square off against the administration's plans to sell sacred Chumash Indian lands. And Garner quits the beach to work as a street cop again, only to be stuck in an office job by his vindictive captain.

programme.title: Point Doom
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E07, Matt's tempestuous affair with a gorgeous motorcycle racer takes him to the brink, while Mitch and Stephanie go head-to-head in a spirited battle of the sexes.

programme.title: Princess of Tides
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E08, A thrilling muscle boat competition is the backdrop for a whirlwind romance between Mitch and a beautiful woman he doesn't know is both a princess and the target of an assassination plot.
